mapper.select: SELECT u.*, r.id AS role_id, r.name AS role_name, r.description AS role_description FROM users u LEFT JOIN user_roles ur ON u.id = ur.user_id LEFT JOIN roles r ON ur.role_id = r.id WHERE u.username = #{username}
